subject: Sales
title: What All Sales Legends Share
description: Learn What All Sales Legends Share in one minute.

hook.text: They span different eras, industries, and personalities. But all sales legends share three traits.

buildup.text: First: unshakable belief. Not in the product, but in the value they deliver to the customer.

discovery.text: Second: relentless persistence. Ziglar was rejected thousands of times. Girard was fired early.

twist.text: Third: deep empathy. Legends who lasted understood customers better than the customers knew themselves.

climax.text: Talent helps. Technique helps more. But belief, grit, and empathy outlast everything else.

punchline.text: Belief, persistence, and empathy. The winning formula.

quiz.question: What three traits do all sales legends share?
